about_the_game:
Demo note:

While the story mode is only 1-2 hours in length (1-4 players), couch-PVP is pretty much a fully-fledged game with multiple maps, characters, and weapons for you and your friends to enjoy. You can play either in the same room (up to 4 players) or online via Steam Play Together (also up to 4 players).

I'm releasing it as a free demo because I realized that most likely I won’t ever have the time to finish the development of the whole thing. However, I will stick around for bug fixes and maybe some minor content updates here and there (assuming there’s actually someone playing it, that is :X).

Enjoy! ^ ^

~SlavDev

----------------------------------------------

Step into the gritty world of SLAVFIGHT, a demo of the electrifying 2D platformer where chaos and combat collide in a dystopian, slav-punk universe! Whether you’re battling it out with friends or delving into an immersive single-player experience, SLAVFIGHT offers a unique blend of frenetic action and captivating storytelling.

features:

  • Local and Online Multiplayer: Challenge up to 4 friends locally or join forces online using 'Steam Play Together.' Engage in high-octane PvP action across six uniquely designed maps, each offering dynamic arenas and tactical depth.

  • PvP Mayhem: Show off your skills in intense multiplayer battles where quick reflexes and strategic thinking are key. With each match featuring different maps and hazards, the thrill never fades.

  • Single-Player/Co-op Adventure: Immerse yourself in the gripping storyline of a near-future dystopia, where technology and despair intertwine. In this demo, explore a portion of the narrative that follows an underdog's rise against a backdrop of post-war devastation and rising authority.

  • Dystopian, Slav-Punk Aesthetic: Experience a visually striking world (it's actually all 2d pixelart and crappy-looking but shhh) that fuses cyberpunk influences with a raw, post-apocalyptic edge. From advanced weaponry to futuristic settings, every element adds depth to this dark and intriguing universe.

  • Epic Storyline: Begin your journey from the depths of obscurity to a legendary confrontation. This demo offers a glimpse into the epic adventure that awaits as you challenge the oppressive forces shaping your world.

    Dive into SLAVFIGHT and get a taste of the action-packed, story-driven chaos that awaits. Gather your allies, test your skills, and prepare for a glimpse into the thrilling future of SLAVFIGHT.

content_descriptors.notes: All and any gore is pixelart, language and topics (especially in story mode) are more on a mature side (f bombs when it makes sense, a talking penis when it doesn't (you can read what it says, not see it, there's no nudity*), some innuendos and 'urmom' jokes as well - I'd hoenstly not play it if I were you, it's a hot piece of garbabe.
